Frozen Carpaccio

Frozen Carpaccio is a food item in Remixed Dungeon that provides a random beneficial effect when consumed.

Description

It's a piece of frozen raw meat. The only way to eat it is by cutting thin slices of it. And this way it's surprisingly good. When eaten, it provides one of four random beneficial effects.

Effects

When consumed, Frozen Carpaccio provides one of four random effects:

  • Invisibility: Makes the hero invisible for a duration equal to Invisibility.DURATION
  • Barkskin: Provides barkskin effect with a level of hero's max HP divided by 4 (25% of max HP)
  • Cleansing: Removes Poison, Cripple, Weakness, and Bleeding debuffs
  • Healing: Heals the hero for HP equal to hero's current HP plus 25% of max HP (hp + ht()/4)

Acquisition

  • Dropped by Ice Elementals with a 10% chance
  • Dropped by Ice Guardians with a 20% chance
  • Can be obtained by burning Mystery Meat

Properties

  • Energy: Restores from Hungry to Starving hunger level (Hunger.STARVING - Hunger.HUNGRY)
  • Price: 10 gold per unit
  • Burning: Turns into Mystery Meat when exposed to fire

Strategy

  • Very valuable item due to random but always beneficial effects
  • Particularly useful for removing negative status effects in dangerous situations
  • The healing effect can be a life-saver in emergencies
  • The invisibility effect can help escape dangerous situations
  • The barkskin effect provides temporary damage reduction

Technical Details

  • Java Class: com.watabou.pixeldungeon.items.food.FrozenCarpaccio
  • Implementation: Extends the Food base class
  • Sprite ID: ItemSpriteSheet.CARPACCIO
  • Effect Selection: Uses Random.Int(5) to select from 4 possible effects

  • Information source: Java Class com.watabou.pixeldungeon.items.food.FrozenCarpaccio
  • Stats verification: Extracted directly from class implementation
